attributes.action: allow all young working people on a low income to work a full year without being taxed
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i have worked since i was 16 for the minimum wage, the more overtime i done, the more tax i would have to pay, when your young your car insurance ect ect is sky high, and its virtuly impossible to have ANY dispeceable money each month
